EmailTemplate.description: CBFS Ready to Ship: Program Information Email Template
EmailTemplate.name: CBFS Ready to Ship (GENERAL INFO)
EmailTemplate.subject: Ready to Ship by Office Depot
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your Account Rep: Doug Thrush douglas.thrush@officedepot.com
We’re proud to introduce our Ready to Ship program of more than 1,200 cleaning & breakroom essentials. Always in stock.
Our Ready-to-Ship assortment was designed so you never have to worry about running low on the products you need most. Shop cleaning & breakroom essentials from coffee to toilet paper to commercial cleaners and so much more.
Out-of-stock products are now a thing of the past. All products in our Ready to Ship assortment are stocked nationwide in our distribution centers. We have a 99.1% customer fill rate and we’re continually monitoring and improving our capabilities to make sure you have supplies when you need them.
An exceptional customer experience is our #1 priority.
